item.title: An unforgettable hitchhiking debut
item.author: Karolina Mazan,
item.description: I’ve always put travelling as my passion under the interests section of my CV. Name any European country and all I can think is ‘been there, done that’. But what have I really seen in all of those places? Fancy hotels with pleasantly warm swimming pools, crowded promenades holding gazillions of …
